name: Angel Shrimp Pasta
author: FOXWORTH
summary: A wonderful shrimp pasta that will delight your family and guests and make them think you spent the day in the kitchen to get this flavor. Good with french bread and green salad if desired.
ingredients: 1 (10.75 ounce) can  condensed cream of mushroom soup
1 pound fresh shrimp, peeled and deveined
directions: In a large skillet over medium heat, melt margarine and saute onions and mushrooms; add soup and processed cheese spread and blend together
Add shrimp and cook for about 10 minutes
Meanwhile, bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Add pasta and cook for 5 to 7 minutes or until al dente; drain
Pour sauce over pasta and serve
